column2: String
str
Oath Gauge
This symbol indicates the defensive stance <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Iron Will<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> is in effect, which increases enmity.
You can view the job gauge description at any time from the Actions & Traits menu.
Oath Gauge

The <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Oath Gauge<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> displays the current strength of a paladin's oath, which increases as auto-attacks are performed. A strong oath is required to execute several select actions such as <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Sheltron<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Cover<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> (acquired at level 45), and <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Intervention<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> (acquired at level 62), and will grow weaker upon using them.
Using certain actions will increase the <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Oath Gauge<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>.
Beast Gauge
This symbol indicates the defensive stance <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Defiance<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> is in effect, which increases enmity.
Beast Gauge

The <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Beast Gauge<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> displays the current strength of a warrior's wrath. This animalistic rage is required to execute several select actions such as <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Inner Beast<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> and <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Steel Cyclone<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> (acquired at level 45) and will grow weaker upon using them.
Using certain actions will increase the <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Beast Gauge<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>.
Blood Gauge
This symbol indicates the defensive stance <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Grit<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> is in effect, which increases enmity.
Darkside Gauge

This timer indicates the duration of <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Darkside<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, which increases damage dealt. Using <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Flood of Darkness<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> or <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Edge of Darkness<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> (acquired at level 40) grants <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Darkside<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>.
Blood Gauge

The <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Blood Gauge<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> displays the amount of <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Blackblood<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> a dark knight has accumulated. <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Blackblood<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> can be consumed to execute actions such as <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Bloodspiller<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> and <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Quietus<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> (acquired at level 64).
Using certain actions will increase the <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Blood Gauge<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>.
Darkside Gauge

This symbol indicates that the <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Dark Arts<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> effect has been granted. This occurs when the barrier applied by the action <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>The Blackest Night<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> has absorbed the full amount of damage.
<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Flood of Darkness<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> and <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Edge of Darkness<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> can be performed by consuming <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Dark Arts<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> instead of MP while the effect is active.
Darkside Gauge
When executing <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Living Shadow<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, a second timer indicating its duration will appear.
Healing Gauge

The <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Healing Gauge<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> displays the current number of <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Lilies<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> a white mage has accumulated. Lilies are accumulated as time passes while engaged in combat.
Lilies are consumed by using the actions <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Afflatus Solace<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> and <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Afflatus Rapture<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> (acquired at level 76).
Healing Gauge

Performing actions that consume Lilies will also nourish the <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Blood Lily<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>. The Blood Lily will bloom after consuming three Lilies, allowing the execution of <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Afflatus Misery<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>.
Aetherflow Gauge

Using the action <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Aetherflow<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> fills the <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Aetherflow Gauge<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, which is required to use certain actions.
Faerie Gauge

The <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Faerie Gauge<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> displays the current amount of fae aether accumulated within a faerie. Fae aether is accumulated by using actions such as <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Lustrate<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> and <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Excogitation<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> in combat, depleting the <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Aetherflow Gauge<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>. Maintaining an <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Aetherpact<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> or using <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Fey Blessing<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> (acquired at level 76) consumes fae aether.
Faerie Gauge

Using the action <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Summon Seraph<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> replaces Eos or Selene with Seraph. The Faerie Gauge will indicate how much time remains before she must return.
Arcana Gauge

The <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Arcana Gauge<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> allows astrologians to keep track of which card (arcanum) is currently drawn. An arcanum is drawn by using the action <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Draw<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, and is placed in the middle of the gauge. Using the <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Play<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> command executes the arcanum's corresponding action.
Divination and Arcana Gauges

Depending on the arcanum used, you will be granted <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Lunar<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Solar<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, or <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Celestial<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> seals. These are consumed when using the <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Divination<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> action, and its effect is strengthened with three different seals in play.
Lightning Gauge

The <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Lightning Gauge<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> indicates a monk's current amount of <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Greased Lightning<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> as well as the time remaining before the effect fades. <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Greased Lightning<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> is accumulated by executing certain weaponskills, improving attack speed and damage dealt.
As a monk or pugilist increases in level, the amount of <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Greased Lightning<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> that can be stored at one time will increase to a maximum of 4 units.
Chakra Gauge

The <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Chakra Gauge<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> indicates the number of chakra a monk currently has opened. Chakra are opened using the action <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Meditation<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, or by using certain weaponskills. Opening 5 allows for the execution of the <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Forbidden Chakra<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> and <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Enlightenment<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> (acquired at level 74).
Lightning Gauge

The action <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Anatman<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> temporarily freezes the <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Greased Lightning<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> timer. While it is frozen, the timer will flash and the <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Lightning Gauge<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> will continue to increase, one unit at a time.
Dragon Gauge

The <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Dragon Gauge<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> is displayed upon executing <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Blood of the Dragon<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, indicating the amount of time remaining before the effect fades. The potency of <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Jump<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> and <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Spineshatter Dive<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> are increased when executed under the effect of <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Blood of the Dragon<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>.
Dragon Gauge

Using the weaponskill <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Mirage Dive<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> while under the effect of <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Blood of the Dragon<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> will attract the gaze of the first brood. The icon on the left of the <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Dragon Gauge<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> indicates the strength of the gaze, up to a maximum of 2 units.

Using <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Geirskogul<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> while under the brood's full gaze will trigger <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Life of the Dragon<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, changing the <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Dragon Gauge<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> to red and allowing for the execution of the devastating weaponskills <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Nastrond<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> and <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Stardiver<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> (acquired at level 80).
Huton Gauge

The <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Huton Gauge<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> indicates time remaining until the <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Huton<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> effect fades.
Ninki Gauge

The <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Ninki Gauge<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> displays the current amount of <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Ninki<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> a ninja has accumulated. <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Ninki<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> slowly builds inside a ninja's body when certain weaponskills are performed and can be used to execute special ninjutsu such as <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Hellfrog Medium<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> and <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Bhavacakra<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> (acquired at level 68).
Sen Gauge

The <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Sen Gauge<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> displays which of the 3 <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Sen<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> effects─<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Setsu<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> (top), <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Getsu<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> (left), and <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Ka<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> (right)─are currently accumulated. <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Sen<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> is required to perform Iaijutsu, the number of <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Sen<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> accumulated determining which weaponskill will be executed─1 for <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Higanbana<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, 2 for <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Tenka Goken<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, and 3 for <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Midare Setsugekka<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>.
Kenki Gauge

The <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Kenki Gauge<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> displays the current amount of <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Kenki<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> a samurai has accumulated. <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Kenki<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> slowly builds in a samurai's blade through the successful execution of weaponskills. <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Kenki<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> is required to execute special devastating attacks such as <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Hissatsu: Kaiten<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Hissatsu: Gyoten<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> (acquired at level 54), <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Hissatsu: Guren<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> (acquired at level 70), and more.
Song Gauge

Singing <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Mage's Ballad<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> will display the action's corresponding <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Song Gauge<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, indicating the effect's time remaining.
If the <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Repertoire<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> effect is triggered while <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Mage's Ballad<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> is being sung, the recast times for <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Bloodletter<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> and <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Rain of Death<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> (learned at level 45) are reset.

<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>“詩心”<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>は<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>「ベノムバイト/コースティックバイト」<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>、<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>「ウィンドバイト/ストームバイト」<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>による継続ダメージの命中時に一定確率で発動します。戦歌を使い、詩心を付与させていくことで吟遊詩人の攻撃力を高めることができます。

Singing <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Army's Paeon<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> will display the action's corresponding <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Song Gauge<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, indicating the effect's time remaining.
If the <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Repertoire<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> effect is triggered while <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Army's Paeon<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> is being sung, the bard is granted reduced cast time and recast time, spell cast time and recast time, and auto-attack delay according to the number of stacks accumulated.

Singing the <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Wanderer's Minuet<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> will display the action's corresponding <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Song Gauge<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, indicating the effect's time remaining.
If the <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Repertoire<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> effect is triggered while the <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Wanderer's Minuet<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> is being sung, the action <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Pitch Perfect<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> will become available. The potency of <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Pitch Perfect<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> increases according to the number of <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Repertoire<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> stacks.
Soul Voice Gauge

The <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Soul Voice Gauge<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> increases in tandem with <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Repertoire<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, and is depleted when using the action <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Apex Arrow<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>.
Heat Gauge

Performing certain weaponskills will increase the <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Heat Gauge<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, and once it is high enough, the action <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Hypercharge<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> will become available. Using <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Hypercharge<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> overheats your weapon and allows the use of <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Heat Blast<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> (acquired at level 35) and <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Auto Crossbow<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> (acquired at level 52).
Heat Gauge and Battery Gauge

The <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Battery Gauge<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> accumulates when certain actions are performed and allows the placement of a <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Rook Autoturret<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, which will attack your target. It also allows the deployment of an <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Automaton Queen<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> (acquired at level 80) to fight alongside you.
Elemental Gauge

The <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Elemental Gauge<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> indicates whether you are under the influence of <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Astral Fire<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> (after casting a <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Fire<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> spell) or <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Umbral Ice<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> (after casting a <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Blizzard<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> spell). While under the influence of <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Astral Fire<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, all <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Fire<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> spells will have increased potency, but require more MP to cast. While under the influence of <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Umbral Ice<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, you will have significantly increased MP recovery.

Executing <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Enochian<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> while under the influence of either <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Astral Fire<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> or <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Umbral Ice<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> will set the lower-right corner of the gauge aglow, indicating its effect is active. <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Enochian<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> increases the potency of magic attacks, as well as unlocks powerful spells such as <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Blizzard IV<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>. <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Enochian<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> fades when <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Astral Fire<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> or <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Umbral Ice<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> expires.

Casting <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Blizzard IV<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> grants 3 <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Umbral Hearts<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> which are represented by the arrows in the gauge's lower-left corner. An <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Umbral Heart<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> is consumed each time a <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Fire<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> spell is cast, nullifying the MP cost increase applied by the <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Astral Fire<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> status.

The <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Enochian<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> bar will fill every 30 seconds the status is maintained. When the crystal at the bottom of the <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Elemental Gauge<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> glows pink, you will be under effect of <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Polyglot<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, which allows the spells <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Foul<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> and <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Xenoglossy<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> (acquired at level 80) to be cast, consuming a crystal.

The <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Enochian<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> bar will fill every 30 seconds the status is maintained. When one or more crystals at the bottom of the <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Elemental Gauge<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> glow pink, you will be under effect of <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Polyglot<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, which allows the spells <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Foul<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> and <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Xenoglossy<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> (acquired at level 80) to be cast, consuming a crystal.
Aetherflow Gauge

Using the action <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Energy Drain<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> fills the <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Aetherflow Gauge<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, which is required to perform certain actions.
Trance Gauge

The <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Trance Gauge<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> indicates the time remaining for <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Dreadwyrm Trance<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>.

Once <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Dreadwyrm Trance<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> has ended, the gauge changes to indicate you have accumulated <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Dreadwyrm Aether<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>.

<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Dreadwyrm Aether<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> allows the summoning of <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Demi-Bahamut<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>. The gauge will indicate the time remaining until it returns.

After entering <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Firebird Trance<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, the <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Trance Gauge<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> indicates the time remaining.
Dreadwyrm Aether
Step Gauge

Performing a <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Standard Step<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> changes the appearance of the <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Step Gauge<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> and causes you to start dancing. Following the displayed icons to execute steps in the correct order and ending with <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Standard Finish<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> will increase your damage dealt and that of the party member designated as your <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Dance Partner<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>. The remaining duration of these effects is displayed beneath the <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Step Gauge<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>.
Fourfold Feathers

Actions such as <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Reverse Cascade<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> and <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Rising Windmill<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> have a chance to grant <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Fourfold Feathers<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, which are consumed by <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Fan Dance<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> and <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Fan Dance II<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> (acquired at level 50).
Step Gauge

Performing a <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Technical Step<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> will display four icons on the <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Step Gauge<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>. Executing the corresponding actions in the correct order followed by <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Technical Finish<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> increases the damage dealt by you and nearby party members.
Fourfold Feathers and Esprit Gauge

The <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Esprit Gauge<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> accumulates when you or party members under the effect of <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Esprit<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>─granted by <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Standard Finish<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> and <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Technical Finish<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>─land weaponskills or spells. It is consumed by the action <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Saber Dance<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>.
Balance Gauge

The <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Balance Gauge<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> displays the current amount of black mana and white mana a red mage has accumulated. Black mana is accumulated by casting spells commonly associated with black magic (such as <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Fire<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> or <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Thunder<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>), and white mana by casting spells associated with white magic (such as <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Aero<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>). There are also some spells and actions that affect both.

When both black and white mana reach a certain amount, weaponskills such as <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Riposte<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> become enchanted and will deal additional damage. If the gap between black and white mana accumulation grows too large, the crystal at the top of the gauge will change color, and it will become more difficult to accumulate the lesser of the two.
Powder Gauge

This symbol indicates the defensive stance <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Royal Guard<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> is in effect, which increases enmity.
Powder Gauge

Performing a combo ending in <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Solid Barrel<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> or <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Demon Slaughter<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> (acquired at level 40) adds cartridges to the <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Powder Gauge<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, which are expended by <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Burst Strike<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> and <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Gnashing Fang<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> (acquired at level 60).

After summoning <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Demi-Phoenix<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, the <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Trance Gauge<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> shows the time remaining until it must return.

Upon learning the action <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Meditate<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, the <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Meditation Gauge<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> will be displayed, indicating the number of stacks of <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Meditation<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> you have accumulated while in combat. Stacks are acquired by executing <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Iaijutsu<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Tsubame-gaeshi<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, or <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Meditate<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, and are expended after executing <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Shoha<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>.
